California.summary: Rainwater harvesting is encouraged statewide with rebates and tax incentives.

Texas.summary: Texas provides property tax exemptions and plumbing code support for rainwater systems.
incentives: Plumbing code supports non-potable indoor use

Georgia.summary: Rainwater collection is legal and promoted under Georgia plumbing code.
incentives: Atlanta rebate up to $100 per barrel

Ohio.summary: Rainwater collection legal for non-potable use under state plumbing code.
